name: Multi Snake
description:
Multi Snake is a 1v1 snake-like where you have to block your opponent to win! 

You can gather powerups to help you: • Freeze 

                                                                  • Fire

                                                                  • Speed

You can choose between 2 differents controls modes: 4 keys where each key represents a direction, or 2 keys where left is for counterclockwise rotation and right clockwise rotation.

Controls: Player 1: zqsd / qd

                 Player 2: ▲◄►▼ / ◄►

Watch the video I made about it: https://youtu.be/vW6WRF3L22w
